--- Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:

> 
> Missile site #2, with optically guided rockets opens the hatch which
> covers
> their location on a hillside overlooking the city.  Once again taking
> aim at
> Cyclonus.  The four rockets, which are substantially larger than the
> ones
> inside the city, fly toward their target with great speed.

OOC: Another quick question. Would the missiles be able to get a line
of sight on Cyclonus at the moment? I do not know the lay out of the
city as well, but as far as I know Cyclonus has drop perhaps 50' down
the side of a 100 foot drop to the water's edge. He should be fairly
well insulated from city view .. but then again I am not sure. 

Preston
(Da'minion)
